content.detailedDescription: I was driving to pick my boyfriend up from work and was dancing to music looking at the clouds be a use it had just rained and the clouds were white and greyish and very fluffy but as i looked to my left in the distance i could see a blue streak coming from no where it was barely visible but because it went over and through a white cloud it made it made me focus to try to see where it came from above the cloud after about 5 seconds i grabbed my cell phone and snapped a picture and the light had already changed and i had to drive away but i kept looking back to see if it was still there and it was as i continued to drive away i could still see it but 35 minutes later i took that same path home and it was gone. i can't figure out where it came from i saw nothing but the beam and heard no sound other than traffic. im noy sure if anyone else saw it but there was a significant amount of traffic.
content.summary: Saw a blue beam come from no where and go through clouds and took photo

content.detailedDescription: My experiences and sightings go back several years. it first started with what i thought were strange and bizarre dreams, but they seemed so real. the more i discounted them as mere dreams and coincidences, the more tangible the encounters and experiences became. it seemed the more experiences i had the more cognitive i became of things that were going to occur in the nest few seconds. i would look at my phone, knowing it was about to ring (i wasn't able to do it at will, however. every now and then). at times on patrol (i'm a police officer), especially when i worked grave shift, there was 2 occurrences when i knew distinctly (and called the person's name audibly) that i was about to see a particular person walking around the corner. this particular time really raised my eyebrows because it was very late at night (around 3am) and this person has been out of state for months and had just returned home. it seemed i knew that i was about to see this person, and i did. at times, i could know who was about to call my phone, or show up at my door. like i stated earlier, i wasn't able to do these things at random, but it was occurring regularly. i have had two (2) actual sightings of objects in the sky, and i had no doubt as to what they were. both times, i would not have even had the mind to look in the sky and in the directions of the objects. it seemed that one second i was driving along with a neutral mind, and then it seemed like something external would tell me to look up and in the exact location of the objects. these encounters have given me a lot of insight to this phenomena. the strange markings that i have on my body (documented by my health care provider), as well as physical proof have left no doubt in my mind that what i thought were mere dreams are way more than that. i have been in what appeared to be medical procedures or inspections so to say, and seemed to have began to wake up with these beings standing around me. once they see that i would be waking up, i would always seem to fall back asleep. being a police officer and army reserve veteran, i'm very confident in beliefs of what i've been encountering. i've pondered for years on going public, but have not due to the consequences of those actions, but i have had too many experiences (too many to try and detail in this narrative)and i'm now ready to disclose them, along with the documentation and physical evidence that i have. i can assure whoever is reading this that that proof that i have of my encounters will be irrefutable.
content.summary: Was driving to work when something seemed to tell me to look up and in that direction. that's when i saw the object.

content.detailedDescription:
The craft was cigar shaped and hovered for approximately 1-2 hours. smoke was emitted, i ran out the room to get my brother, when i came back it was gone.

my father was with me and took a photograph which i still have today.
content.summary: Cigar shaped object from childhood

content.detailedDescription:
On wednesday 2nd march 2011 at 6pm i was watching our local tv news granada reports, they said that at approximately 6.30pm if you look to the west you will be able to see the international space station (iss) traveling along the west coast south to north.
so at 6.30pm i got my binoculars out and went into my back garden to have a look, when i went outside it was twilight not to dark and not to light it was a very clear cloudless sky with good visibility.
after about 5 minutes the iss came into view as i was watching the iss disappeared behind some houses at the side of my house , so i stood on a platform in my back garden to try and get a better view.
some kids were playing in the street behind my house and they asked me what i was looking at, i told them i was watching the international space station, as i said that a bright oval shaped object appeared from the west over the houses at the side of my house, i say bright it was as bright as a house light bulb easy to look at, it travelled from west to east in a straight line we just stood there watching it the kids in the street and myself, i'm only guessing but it was about 300 to 500ft directly above us and approximately 20 to 30ft wide 60 to 70ft long it was a perfect oval shape and we could see it very clearly it lasted about 2 to 2 and a half minutes to disappear in the east.
content.summary: While watching the iss a oval object appeared from west to east

content.detailedDescription: Every single night for the last several months, i have been noticing a bright light in the sky pretty much right in the back of my house. there are actually more than one, usually between four and five. the others do not produce enough light for me to get them on my cell phone camera. at first i thought maybe it was a satellite, but it is way lower than any satellite in the surrounding sky. and this one in particular shines way brighter. i was able to get it on my cell phone, but i cannot send it to any place other than my facebook page because it says that the file is too big to send to my email. if you would like to see the video please check out my post, and if it is gone by the time you investigate this i will repost it for you. this is an amazing thing. i believe it is a genuine thing. i have seen many documentaries about ufo's and have gained quite a bit of insight as to the realm of coincidental possibilities. i can assure this is not a coincidence. these ufo's appear to be on some kind of very slow cruise control across the sky and around the earth. the fact that they appear into the setting sun has really made it difficult to get photo's or video's because by the time the sun goes down enough to film they are out of range. the light however continues to shine. i have several video's on my phone from a few different days. the one that i posted on my facebook page has a stable blue light and a red blinking light at the bottom. the actual shape of the ship is illusive because there is not anything to light it up. there are only lights on the bottom and the top. it is amazing how it shines brightly like a star, but when filmed it is only two lights. there were two side by side the other night that had matching lights. i have a video of that one too but again it is difficult for me to send these things online from my phone. nothing has changed in all of these months, i would imagine by the time you get this report things will continue. i encourage you to come out here, bring a high quality camera and witness this amazing display. they are no longer hiding. they want the world to see them. this is the first step in a global awakening.
content.summary: For the last several months i have been seeing a star like light in the sky at sunset.

content.detailedDescription: I don't have the time at the moment to complete this i saw an obvious type of intellectual aircraft fully controlled by something i will probably never think about life the same way again it was completely mind blowing .
content.summary: Walked outside to smoke and observed a large bright silent object in the sky stationary until slowly drifted out of sight

content.detailedDescription:
Got off of work a couple of minutes past 8 pm in boerne, tx. headed home to bandera, tx through hwy 46 to hwy 16 west. after turning left onto hwy 16 west, racing up the hill and turning the first curve to the right. i noticed a quarter inch line lit up in the sky towards bandera. i some what recklessly watched it the rest of the way home. it seemed to hover and never change but then again, i was driving.  by the time i got to first light just before bandera, i noticed that it had doubled in it's size from when i first saw it. i started looking for a place to pull over but didn't till after i passed the light and just before a sign that reads, "purple sage rd --->. it was to the right of the road. i took a couple of pics with my iphone and left. then pulled into my drive and parked. i started looking at the pics and my husband came out to help me unload. i told him about it and showed him. he said, "that's no plane. maybe a meteor.". i said, "neither one would stick around in the same spot that long, and their are no trail clouds any where.". we tried to seek it from our house. no sign. so we took every thing in the house. i went to the rest room and we headed back out to the spot about 3 miles east of bandera. nothing and no sign of anything having been in the area. so i took a picture of the sign just in front of where i had pulled over the first and second time. 

i don't feel anything with my sightings. well, maybe comforted.
content.summary: Small hovering line towards bandera, tx

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside on he front step, went out to the drive way looked up into the day sky and noticed a cool rainbow effect around the sun. i starting shooting wit my galaxy alpha. i couldn't make out what i was shooting because the sun was so bright and whited out my phone display. i did my best at several vantage points to catch the sun dog. 

i later went through my pictures and noticed the orb, which seemed to be through out the image sequence and moving in some sort of pattern. i looked closely and realized there are lights within the orb in a specific patter which seem to stay in equal pattern but in different perspective as if a round object would with lights on it. i also noticed a purple hue around the orb. in one picture there seems to be something in the sun angled almost like a line or disc at an angle, the rest of the shots have the orb against the blue of the atmosphere.
content.summary: Was taking photos of sun dog creatig rainbow around sun. took pix and notices what i captured. i had no idea what i was photographing

content.detailedDescription: I was inside the apartment when i felt i was to go outside and usually when i feel that there is always a celestial craft . .  as if it calls me to let me know they are there/here. so i walked out onto the balcony looking up at the moon which was high in the southern sky. there was a star up by the moon which i thought was an actual planet or star but there was too much light in the sky still. this starcraft begins to move in an arc like motion indicating it was not yet in the lower atmosphere. still it moved in an arcing sweeping motion. it continued to the northeast as i observed for a couple minutes before the light faded or disappeared. there were many planes on approach to dfw and others being guided on their approach flight. this had no blinking lights and brightened before finally disappearing.
content.summary: A star up by the moon turns out being a craft and begins moving towards the northeast

content.detailedDescription: Yo me encontraba en la azotea de mi casa a eso de las 10 de la noche del 20 de junio del 2012. imposible olvidar aquella experiencia tan impresionante. primero me llamã³ la atenciã³n las luces de lo que parecã­an estrellas pero que se desplazaban en formaciã³n delta y lo hacã­an en forma lenta, por lo que di aviso a mi cuã±ado tony mendoza, mientras bajaba yo por mi cã¡mara. hice algunos disparos pero no logrã© captar nada, tal vez por que era de noche o mi cã¡mara no era de las buenas. despuã©s de ello quedamos contemplando el cielo buscando alguna otra cosa rara, pero nada pasã³; luego de 15 minutos, mi cuã±ado se retirã³ por que tenia algo urgente que hacer pero yo me quedã© esperando, tenã­a la sensaciã³n de que algo iba a pasar. de pronto divisã© a lo lejos otras 2 flotillas que se desplazaban en direcciã³n de sur a norte en relaciã³n a la ciudad. luego cuando pensã© que ya todo habã­a terminado, de la nada aparecieron unas luces a unos 15 a 20 metros sobre mi cabeza, la forma no se definã­a bien, pero debajo del objeto, se veã­an unas 10 luces rojas cuadradas distribuidas en forma triangular, por lo que deduzco que esa era la forma del objeto no identificado, lo que me causã³ mayor impresiã³n fue la lentitud con la que se desplazã³ casi por encima de mi cabeza sin emitir ningãºn tipo de sonido o vibraciã³n. nadie mã¡s fuera de nosotros se percatã³ del hecho, es mã¡s se sentã­a en el ambiente una especie de calma y silencio inexplicable.
content.summary: Objeto con 10 luces rojas cuadradas distribuidas en forma triangular

content.detailedDescription: Estaba viendo television con mi hermano, cuando me acerco a la ventana para tomar un poco de aire, cuando diviso un objeto de forma prisma triangular con una luz en el centro. el objeto era de color brillante y blanco medio plata; estuvo estatico 30 minutos y luego se movio hacia el oeste. no tenia ninguna duda de que era un ovni. luego de 30 minutos mas regreso a su posicion original, pero ya no era tan brillante, sino opaco. me acerque a querer tomarle una foto y de un derrepente el objeto ascendio, casi como si no quisiera que lo viese. me escondi y a los 15 minutos regrese a la ventana y estaba alli brillando; tomã© el celular para tomarle la foto y el poste de luz que alumbra la fachada de mi casa se apagã³. no podia creerlo. llamã© a mi papa y me dijo que ya le habia pasado eso y que no me queria contar para que no ande pendiente del objeto. llamã© a mi mama para que viese el objeto conmigo, estaba estatico, y al cabo de 40 minutos el objeto se volvio mas brillante y mi mama se asustã³. llamã© a mi hermano y vimos que un pequeã±o objeto brillante color rojo salio del primer objeto y luego se fueron rapidamente en direcciones opuestas... he tenido varias experiencias con este tipo de objetos y en otras formas.
content.summary: El objeto era un prisma triangular emitia luz

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Went outside to smoke i always look in the sky as i like to look at the planets moon etc so im always sky watching saw a bunch of birds scatter in the distance then saw what looked like an orange ball which i thought may be a balloon except it was floating up just steady towards my house then i noticed two black objects to either side of it but slightly behind it almost forming a triangle formation i thought the were birds but as it got closer no wings flapping as it started to go over the house i ran to the back through the house and it was gone was flying higher than bird level
content.summary: Outside approx 730 saw an orange ball w 2 black objects floating behind thought it was birds behind but just stationary floating went over house went to the back and it was gone

content.detailedDescription: I was serving in the army at the time of my sighting. we were flying home to glasgow from munster airport in germany. we were in the air about 10 minutes or so when i looked out of my window. i was stunned and amazed to see this ufo flying just down to the left of the plane. it carried on tracking for at least 3 to 5 minutes. i turned round for a moment to point out to the guy sitting next to me, that there was an ufo outside the plane. i decided to say nothing for the fear of being mocked. when i looked out the window again the ido was still there, then within a minute it sped off at an incredible speed. i haven't spoken to anyone about this sighting. it has just been lately that i have been watching hanger 1 on tv. it was then that i decided to contact you's at muffin. since that day in 1976 i have been a firm believer that we are not alone. i have a great interest in the subject and therefore i thought i would share my story with you's.  thank you [name removed/cms/jpg]. ps i have no evidence, but this did happen.
content.summary: Seen this medium sized ufo whilst on a flight from munster in germany, travelling to glasgow. our flight was in the air about 10mins. i was sitting in the window seat when i looked down and this black ufo was tracking the plane at the planes speed.

content.detailedDescription: First of all i have been abducted many times throughout my life. i'm just glad that there were other witnesses to this event. me and my sister were sitting at the kitchen table at about 1 am we heard a loud thump at the front of the trailor went and looked thinking maybe something had fallen or something but nothing was out of place. about an hour later we heard the same exact thump at the opposite end of the trailor, again we inspected and nothing was out of place. at that point we thought that maybe someone was outside messing with us. so we went outside and looked but all was silent and no one was around. we went back inside and just brushed it off. at about 3 am we were sitting at the kitchen table talking when we heard an extremely load roaring sound and feeling the vibrations. my sister looked out the window and said "oh my god it's a ufo". immediately i started screaming( like a little girl i am ashamed to say) because of past abduction experiences. then my sister started screaming also. all the screaming had awoken my youngest nephew who was sleeping in the back bedroom who was around 10 or 11 months old at the time. my oldest nephew who was close to 3 at the time did not wake up the whole time which is very strange because he was sleeping on the couch and we were practically screaming in his ear. anyways i just wanted to get the heck out of there and try to stop whatever was going to happen. my instincts led me to run and grab my youngest nephew because he was screaming. i was terrified but i couldn't just leave him. so i ran out the back door with him in my arms but waited for my sister(which was only seconds but felt like a lifetime). as i stood there the ufo was right above me roaring the whole time but with no wind heat or anything but the noise. it was so low i could have hit it with a rock just by tossing it. when my sister finally came out she was alone and i said what r u doing go grab (i don't want to use real names) your other kid so she did(she later explained that she felt that the children were in no danger that "they" were there for us. as she went back inside i ran to the next door neihgbors house and started beating on the door and yelling for him to wake up i even tried opening and kicking the door in because i was so scared. my sister or i had no phone that's why i went to the neighbor. all the while the ufo was just hovering still roaring very loudly. when my sister came out carrying her other child we ran to our parents house that was a few doors down because the neighbor never did come to the door (who later stated that he heard us screaming bloody murder then pounding on his door and he also heard the loud roaring but said he couldn't move that he was paralyzed)so i kicked my parents door in and ran to their bedroom woke them up and told them what was happening and my mom asked if we had taken lsd which was not the case. so i went to the phone and dialed 911 and hung up because i knew they probably wouldn't believe my story.Finally the police showed up and tried to say it was an airplane that they saw serial numbers on it which i know better. one of the officers said it was heading to a nearby airport but when i mentioned the thumps we heard the one officer seemed spooked and asked us about it then the other cop shushed him. i told the one officer to take me to that airport and show me because i knew he was full of crap. he threatened to take me to jail for " false" use of 911. if a ufo that loud and flying that low (not including my abduction experiences) isn't an emergency then what is? i know the cops had to have seen what we saw by the way they acted and i am 99 percent sure there are police records to prove my claims. the craft that we saw that night was triangle shaped with a yellowish light in each corner. dullish black in color about 100 to 150 feet on each side. some sort of dullish black dome on top. and about 8 to 10 feet tall. it emitted no wind or heat but did make a very loud roaring sound the whole time . it would take an incredible amount of energy for something that size to just sit stationary.
content.summary: Heard a loud roaring looked out window saw it ran outside to get help next door saw it hovering called 911 then the police came could have hit it with a rock

content.detailedDescription: Looked like a cloud but shape of ufo moving from east to west in straight line.  clouds were moving west to east.
content.summary: Looked like a cloud but shape of ufo moving from east to west in straight line.  clouds were moving west to east.

content.detailedDescription: Recovered sd card from game trail camera photos were on it one  with nothing on first and last image  on it
content.summary: Orbed shaped

content.detailedDescription: I was 18 at the time. i was on a hunting trip with my dad and two friends. we started the trip early. we drove up 154 then turned left on west camino cielo. windy road took some time get to refugio canyon. when we did, we ran into a buck. following it for a short time then stoped   that is when we separated.They wanted to go back and look for the buck. i went walking down the road. that is when i hear a swish sound to my left.I see a cigar shaped object 100yards away going 25 mpr silver color coming up from the canyon it went down  the canyon over the free way into the channel took a left turn down the channel. there was low fog over the free way and the channel. i was high above the fog and it was clear. we were not far from vandenberg air force base i thought it was some sort of a new guided missile because it was going so slow.
content.summary: I thought all ufo were round big surprse

content.detailedDescription:
Friend asked me to report this here...
on this afternoon, me and youngest daughter, aged 11, were watching the clouds and sunset as we normally do. during this, i observed a c5a galaxy military aircraft flying east to west, i observed this aircraft with binoculars for id. i commented how big the contrail was and my daughter thought it was very cool. 

after it passed overhead, it turned to the northwest from my 12 o'clock position, i handed the binoculars to my daughter to watch it. she then stated that there was something beside the plane, i asked flying beside or was it in different travel path. she said no it was beside the aircraft, i asked if it was another plane and she stated she didn't see any wings on it that it looked like a light. she then handed the binoculars back to me. 

i observed the light and it was white in color, when i saw it, it was no longer beside but had dropped back behind the c5. it was at this point the light began a westward track and seemed very slow. i observed no wings or tail. the object was not flashing but a steady white light color. 

i asked my daughter if she could she it without the binoculars and she stated no. i looked without them and could not see it. it was only visible with the binoculars. i then handed them back to my daughter but she was unable to find it again. 

we saw several aircraft that night including a fed-ex plane (id'd by paint scheme with binoculars), all had contrails and were identifiable as winged aircraft. this was not. 

if i was to guess size, due to the distance i would be hesitant and guess near the size of the engines at the distance we saw.
content.summary: White light beside military transport

content.detailedDescription:
It was about 7:30. i pulled out of my boyfriends house to go grab us some hot wings to go from buffalos for dinner. i only driven 4 houses down and for some reason i looked up. the sunroof in my jeep cherokee was open. i saw an object that i never thought could exist. it was so massive, my stomach tightened at the sight of it and my stomach still hurts today when i talk about how large it was. the thing that scared me more than the size was how quiet it was. i couldn't believe how large it was and i would have still never known it was there unless i looked up. the bottom of the craft looked like a crazy maze design like on the bottom of someone's shoe. i only saw one light on one of its sides as it flew over but i could still see the other side of the craft. i don't know how i did it but i never stopped driving. i think i was in shock and didn't know what i had seen. i went to buffalos and picked up our order of food and when i got home i put the food down and just sat and stared at the kitchen table. my boyfriend asked me what was wrong and i almost didn't tell him what i saw. i finally got it out and he told me i was tired and he didn't believe me. this was a few years ago and i'm with someone new now who believes me so i figured id tell my story. there are some things i still haven't told him, not because i'm afraid he won't believe me but because i just feel like a crazy person trying to talk about it so i figured an anonymous letter might help me.  
since that first sighting i've seen more ufos. and i've had many dreams about abduction (which of course could simply be dreams) but every abduction dream has been different. again these are dreams so please don't call me crazy.
my first abduction dream there was a very tall looking being in my bedroom. i screamed so loud and fell all over myself trying to get away. the alien looked like an insect. like a praying mantis. its skin didn't look like an insect though. it was wrinkly. like an old person who had smoked and gone to the tanning bed for way too many years. it looked like it didn't fit the body it was on. anyway, as i was screaming a female voice spoke in my mind and told me not to be afraid. there were two other shorter beings that were on either side of the insect looking one but i didn't see them too well. that's all i remember of that one.
my next abduction dream i was put in some kind of room with an alien. it had blue-gray like skin and huge eyes (just as most people describe i guess) it looked sad, almost ill. and for some reason i felt sorry for it. it was almost like it had been cast away from the others. i lay down behind him and kissed him on the back of the neck. and then he looked back at me with huge eyes, surprised. i told him in my mind that he was okay and i didn't care what he was.
my next abduction dream i just remember looking through a huge glass window at planets and the stars and i knew everything. i understood how the universe worked. i woke up that morning with everything on the tip of my tongue but couldn't get myself to remember.
my next abduction dream was a painful one. i was being tortured along someone else that i can't remember. two beings were trying to get inside of my head to see something. i resisted them through my entire dream and they were so angry. it was like i had done something wrong and they were punishing me or trying to find out what i had done. all i remember was i couldn't let them know something.
my next abduction dream i was taken and i remember screaming for them to stop trying to make me forget. that i don't need to forget. i begged for them to let me remember.
my next two abduction dreams i was being taught how to move objects with my mind. in the first dream i wasn't very good at it. in the second dream they injected me with something that made me so good at it that i couldn't control it. everything started flying off around me and it was too much. i remember how to do it. i know it's super crazy to say but when i wake up in the morning i still feel like i can do it. yes, its embarrassing but i've tried to move objects during the day and big surprise, nothing happens. because again, these are just dreams. at the end of the day i guess i just want to know if people have dreams like this. i have a constant horrible feeling everyday that i'm forgetting something very important. i feel like everything is on the tip of my tongue and i can't quit reach it. i haven't seen many ufos since that first sighting but whenever i see one i get a home sick feeling. i feel like i miss someone. i hope i don't have some kind of weird disorder. i have anxiety and feel paranoid about people following me or being watched. the feeling of not remembering or missing something has gotten depressing its honestly so bad. just looking for answers. but if i'm crazy, then i guess my next trip will be to the doctor to get some anxiety medication. i just hate taking medicine to solve something. maybe i'll just stick to watching cartoons on tv to avoid scary feelings and maybe i'll have no more dreams. anyway, thanks mufon for wanting to help and listening to peoples stories. all of us crazies gotta stick together! ;-)
content.summary: Very large, slow moving, silent triangular object

content.detailedDescription: As i drove up the slip road/round about into the motorway across the lanes just above the high voltage power lines appeared this up to 30ft chrome like oval ball, it stayed stationary for some seconds then disappeared as i watched.
content.summary: A silver metallic oval ball up to 30 feet long.

content.detailedDescription:
I have had several encounters with what i believe to be beings that are not human. although there have been many encounters i have clears memories of only parts of three of the encounters. the following is a description of what i do remember of those three encounters.
number one: (1970) i was 10 years old
i was living in geata, italy. my father was career navy. we lived there for five years. i would like to point out that at that we had no television and had not had television for well over a year or two.
one night i woke up to find several strange creatures standing around my bed and doing i do not know what to me. the beings themselves did not really scare me, i was not being harmed. what did scare me was that when they communicated the words were not heard by my ears but would just be understood as sound in my head. i was told that they were preparing me for future visits. i got up from the bed left the room and went across the hall to the door of my parent’s room. i told them what was going on. they told me i was having a bad dream and to go back to bed. i went back to my room. after a few more minutes i was “told” by the beings that they intended me no harm and that because they could tell i was afraid they would be leaving but that they would return.    

for twenty years after that night i had no further memories of their returning. i did though have many days when i would awake in the mornings and feel tired. i had a strange feeling that i had not slept much that night and that something had happened, i felt somehow violated but could not put my finger on why. as strange as it sounds i could not even force myself to dwell on the feelings. i could only recall things like trying to scream but nothing would come out, wanting to run but being paralyzed. i could not recall why i wanted to scream or run.
number two: (1992) i was about 30 years old
by this time i had come to realize that i was being visited by something at times but could recall very little about the visits. that all changed one night after a visit in a hotel in bandung, indonesia. i became aware one night that i was on a vessel of some kind, being escorted down a hall way by two beings that i was familiar with. i could tell by the curvature of the hall that the vessel was round. there was a door every so often on my right side but they were closed. if they had been open they would have been exterior doors. 
i finally got to a point to where there was a door on the left, it was open. across from that door was another exterior door. sitting next to the exterior door was a slightly chunky brunette woman who was without clothes. i tried to ask her to help me but as usual nothing would come out. she gave me a look that showed she also wanted help but could offer none.  
i was escorted through the door on the left, into an examination room. in that room there was an examination table perpendicular to the door with two beings standing with their backs to us. they were standing at the foot end of the table. across from them, on the other side of the table, facing them was a tall being. i knew him to be the one in charge. on the same side of the table as the tall one but with her back to me was another being who i knew to be female and i was very familiar with her. i got on the table.
the tall male then communicated by saying hello and telling me to not worry that i had nothing to fear. he then went on to say “you remember cela, she has be there every time we have visited you”. at that time a few things happened all at once. she turned around. one of the two beings now on my right at the foot of the table said “she is there every time because having someone familiar there makes them easier to control”. she stepped towards me saying “tonight we are going to do sex things, you like that.” i then reached up with my left hand and grabbed her around her skinny neck. i squeezed as tight and as hard as i could, i had her good, she was in trouble.
then simultaneously the tall one asked “how has this happened, i thought we had control of him”. the two others responded “i don’t know, we did have control of him; we thought we had control of him”. then for some reason my hand just opened up and released her. the tall one then grabbed her to keep her from falling, she was hurt bad. the tall one then said “return him; return them all”. it turned out there was seven of us.     
the next thing i recall was standing behind some bushes as one of us was returned to their place. i do not remember how they were returned but i do remember my own returning.
i was staying in a building separate from the main hotel. at the front door of my building was small entrance way. to the left was stairs heading up to my level. to the right was a karaoke bar. the two beings escorting me stepped through the entrance way as a lady who worked at the karaoke bar stepped into the entrance way. she just kind of went blank and stood there. as i stepped on to the stairs heading up to the level of my room she kind of like unfroze and looked at me. it was obvious that she was confused. i think to her i had just appeared there. i kept walking up the stairs, she stood there confused.
my two escorts and i made our way to my room. the next thing i knew i woke up in my bed with a great since of accomplishment! i could remember most of what happened the night before. i felt like “wow i got her”!
after that night i had years where i felt they were no longer visiting me. then i became aware that i was wrong. they were still coming but they had a new trick.
it became clear over the next several years that they were still visiting me but now they caused me to interlock my fingers, try as i might i could not pull my hands apart.
number three: (2009) i was about 48
the last memory i have of them coming to visit was four or five years ago now. on this occasion i found myself outside my parent’s house in alabama with several beings around me. their craft was sitting next to the woods; i was sitting on the tailgate of my truck, with my fingers interlocked. my dog was there and unfazed by the beings. i was told that they would no longer be visiting me and they were there to remove something that allowed them to find me. i was told they were giving me some kind of information and was told that when the time came i would know how to use this information. i have no memory of what this information was.      
that is my story.
i would like help in remembering more, but i don’t know how to go about finding that help.
i am not looking for any help with paying for any help i could get in retrieving memories. i just want to be pointed in the direction to find that help.
content.summary: Rounded oval craft with dorrs and stairs standing on legs

content.detailedDescription:
1-seen from my back yard
2-my wife called me after noticing weird lights thru the spa window
3-ufo's after i wondered if they were lanterns but wind was in opposite direction
4-to me they looked like a squadron of ufo's on parade
5-amazed,goose bumps and excitement 
6-they simply vanished out of sight due to tree foliage
content.summary: Looked like a squadron of white-yellow-orange-to red orbs on a parade.

content.detailedDescription: Sat in sky for a minute then wired flight patterns then vanished across the sky. left greenish-blue exhaust pattern.
content.summary: Flying in weird patterns then speed across sky and vanished left greenish blue exhaust trail

content.detailedDescription: In mid-september of 2004, i was sitting outside on my deck around 11pm, speaking with a friend, who lived on the west side of mcfarland, on the phone. the night was clear, and cool.  at this time, i was living on the southwest side of madison.  during the conversation, she mentioned that 'they' were back.  when i asked who 'they' were, she said the ufos.  she said they appeared to be over the lake (lake waubesa).  i looked toward that direction, east-southeast, and i saw 2 - 3 bright, blue-white lights traveling in a vertically-oriented, elliptical pattern.  the highest point of the 'orbit' was about 60 - 70 degrees above the surface of the deck, with the trees/houses obstructing the view to about 30 degrees of elevation.  at times i could see 2 objects and at times i could see 3 objects. while my friend and i were discussing the lights, her sister called her to tell her that the ufos were over the lake (her sister also lived in mcfarland). both my friend and her sister had seen lights similar to this on a few prior occasions.  we watched the lights for around 15 - 20 minutes, and then they just disappeared, like they had been 'turned off'. both the lights and their flight pattern were unlike anything i'd seen before.  the lights were a bright blue-white, and glowed, with distinct edges.  the lights were a little smaller than a quarter held at arms length. due to a prior experience, i called mufon investigator beverly trout, and discussed this sighting with her.
content.summary: 2 -3 circular lights traveling in a vertical eliptical orbit over lake waubesa area

content.detailedDescription: In bed with wife she was sleeping i felt their presense same time each year it seemed to they were observing, then i gota dog i took it to bed this time when they came the dog barked at them they were shocked at this as i think they had come for me this time as when they went it appeared wehen they left in their ship they appeared annoyed as as they left the ship may a loud roaring noise my wife was not aware of anythig at any time i have since had a stroke but still remember this as if was yesterday.
content.summary: Bedroom few times over time until i got a dog this frightened them away never came back.

content.detailedDescription: At my house walked outside looked to the sky and seen orange floating ball this is not the first time we have seen these things many times some of witch was just one orb/ball floating in other cases 3 or more at a time forming some type of shapes the objects seem to come and go i believe i can call these things in a meditation like state sometimes they will appear right away other times they appear weeks latter after a mediation session i would very much like to be contacted and show my support sadly i do not have the kinda money it takes to be put into the inner circle but some of my knowledge may be useful if you give me a chance looking forward to hearing back if not i completely understand thank you for the time .
content.summary: Orange ball hovering over house not the first time iv'e seen these have seen these many time's

content.detailedDescription: My wife took the dog out ~ midnight and shortly after she yelled at me to come outside quickly.  when i went out she pointed into the sw sky at two objects that were like flaming orbs that about 10 degrees apart above the horizon.  the were flying at a steady rate and she said there were several more before it.  the two objects appeared to be part of a larger object.  as this object disappeared beyond our site another object appeared from the same southern direction traveling at about the same speed one after the other (no sounds) sometimes in pairs but almost identical in size although some of them seemed to be 'strobing' whereas others looked like they were pulsating.  shortly after we saw the last object a fog bank rolled in and we went back inside a little after 1am est.  i went back out to check a few times and didn't see anymore but apparently the fog had also move on as well.  we did see a few planes flying at cruising altitude and we are between some airports in the area so seeing a plane with it's landing and/or marker lights is normal for us as they'll int typically be decelerating for final approach around here.  these weren't any planes that we've seen before and when they disappeared they appeared to pick up speed to a point that the light just became impossible to see.
content.summary: Observed around 15 pulsating orange objects for almost an hour period 5/29/15.

content.detailedDescription: I was opening the gate of the garage, when raising his eyes to the horizon, i saw something that was approaching from sw. the object emitted a bright light in front that looked like one were to stop after about ten meters in front of the object. my dog ​​was barking for no reason and was extremely nervous, i called my wife and asked her if she could see what i was seeing, to view my wife was frightened and ran into the garage. i followed her and went to the window of the garage to see the object again, while i was going to open the window, my cat that was on the windowsill nearly scratched my face and made with a jump went into hiding in the house. the object now was passing over my house, and i noticed the lights on either side of the disc that changed various colors (green, orange yellow ect.). courses from the garage on the first floor, and went to take the videotape, but this did not seem to work out, but i always kept the charge, ran out the front door and saw the object passing over my house without any noise to the north, then disappeared behind the houses. one thing that i noticed is that there was fog, before arriving at home, but there was no sign at the sighting of the fog at 0:35 am. then about 1:10 am the fog was a great deal and formed suit at a time !!!
content.summary: Incredible!!!

content.detailedDescription: At 11:52 p.M. i went out on the balcony to smoke a cigarette.  the movement in the sky made me take notice of a large spherical object hovering over the ocean near 20th in the direction of the peer. the orb was reddish orange in color. the flying object blinked, appeared and reappeared several times as it was making its path.  it appeared to be moving from right to left but that movement was not visible because it would disappear and reappear as it was moving.  after watching for approximately a minute, i called another person to see the object.  at this point, we both viewed it from the balcony moving quietly without sound or emission. as it moved from south to north we saw a green flashing light in addition to the glowing red orange color of the object. we were both uncertain as to the sighting of the object and really did not know what we were seeing because of the size of the flying object, the manner in which it hovered and appeared/disappeared, the red-orange glowing color, the lack of sound, and the closeness of the object. the orb eventually disappeared as it was making its way up the coast. i really don't know what this was but i wish i had taken a video.
content.summary: Large orb seen in night sky at 11:52 p.M. and observed for approximately 2 and a half minutes.

content.detailedDescription:
Pinpoint white star-like objects appeared in broad daylight.  the first appeared from behind some clouds. if i had to guess i would say the apparent size was a pinhead at arms length. very bright like a star in broad daylight.  i had on sunglasses and would not have seen the object without them being on.  the object hovered extremely high in the sky (bwi flight path was in the same area and multiple planes of various sizes passed well below the object.)  the object seemed to hover for 5 minutes as i watched. then the object grew fainter, fuzzier as it appeared to be ascending.  eventually, the object disappeared.  it did not track across the sky but seemed to be rising straight up from it's original position.

a few minutes later, another white star-like object appeared within the same one-inch patch of sky.  this object seemed to be moving upward and southward (however, the entire track of movement was less that a half-inch from my view.  as with the previous object, it seemed to start ascending, getting fuzzier and fainter, until it too disappeared.

neither object moved erratically, like a balloon.  they both moved steadily.

they reminded me of video i have seen of mexican lights (bright, round orbs.) i would say these were smaller.  i got the sense that they were extremely high in the atmosphere.

there was considerable air traffic during the entire sighting, however, any of the commercial jets and smaller craft were much closer to the ground.

without my sunglasses on, i would never have seen these things.
content.summary: Pinpoint white star-like objects appeared in broad daylight
